data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Shinyanga.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Shinyanga, Tanzania

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Shinyanga, Tanzania the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 168,670 believers in Shinyanga to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,366,130 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 615,825 people in the state of Shinyanga who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Shinyanga, Tanzania a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 168,670 believers in the state of Shinyanga the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Shinyanga, Tanzania.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

location.name: Shinyanga
location.cities_list: Shinyanga, Kahama, Old Shinyanga, Songwa, Mwadui
location.cities_list_w_pop: Shinyanga (107,362), Kahama (36,014), Old Shinyanga (23,747), Songwa (23,618), Mwadui (23,296)
